Description of incident: A breach of Butler Schein Animal Health's (BSAH) systems (MyVetDirect.com) may have affected clients whose veterinarian's websites were hosted by MyVetDirect.com.  People who placed orders on veterinarian websites that were hosted by MyVetDirect.com may have had their names, credit card information and numbers, addresses, telephone numbers, email addresses, billing and delivery information, and other purchase information obtained.
